title: NDMA provides 40,000 COVID diagnosis kits to provinces
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 7 (APP): National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA) has provided some 40,000 COVID test kits to the provinces for immediate diagnosis of the virus.
According to spokesperson, the airports have been provided 20,000 the kits for diagnosis of coronavirus.
Some 80,000 PCR (Polymerase chain reaction) kits have also been provided to the provinces.
